Header: The Commonwealth Secretary General arrived in Sri Lanka
Content: Commonwealth SecretaryGeneral, Patricia Scotland has arrived in Sri Lanka.Â  She was welcomed by officials of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs at the Bandaranaike International Airport in Katunayake this afternoon. Patricia Scotland will be in Sri Lanka for four days under her official visit. During her visit, she is scheduled to meet Prime Minister Ranil Wickremesinghe, Foreign Minister Tilak Marapana and several other key officials. This is the first visit of Patricia Scotland to Sri Lanka.
